name: Polygon-Acceleration
description:
A game where you can either drive freely on the different maps or complete races where you must beat the clock to win. 

You can play online for free where you can play as a guest or login to submit your best time on the leaderboard and see how you rank against other players.

Alternatively you can download the game for the offline version(no ads and no leaderboard). 
Also you can play it for free by clicking the link below https://www.gamearter.com/game/polygon-acceleration/

Note:If you see the policy violation message just hit the X and continue to play. If you can’t play just click the link and play the game there and leave a comment to let me know. Thanks 

 CONTROLS

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move the car. 

Up arrow and W is to go forward 

Down arrow and S is to slow down or reverse 

Left arrow A is to turn left

right arrow D is to turn right

Spacebar is the brakes

P or Escape to pause and un-pause

If you crash just pause and click the restart level button in the top right
